title: Racial Cloud Over McDonald's Golden Arches
itunes:title: Racial Cloud Over McDonald's Golden Arches
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses surging Covid cases due to the omicron variant. Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Senior Investigative Reporter Susan Berfield talk about McDonald's settling lawsuits with Black owners who say they were blocked from the best and most profitable restaurant locations. Grayscale CEO Michael Sonnenshein shares his thoughts on how investors should play cryptocurrencies. And we Drive to the Close with Vince Nichols, Global Equity Investment Specialist at BNP Paribas Asset Management.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
